After you had uttered these words you both felt and saw the skunk begin to sit up and also stretch as well as he replied, "Morning." And once he was looking down at you he added, "I hope you slept okay..."

"Yeah, I did." You reassured the huge skunk with a big smile on your face.

"Good." Peter let out, before you felt one of his huge fingers move over to you and then gently rub the top of your head.

This cuased you to blush and upon looking at the skunk he was blushing too. Sadly this moment of yours was quickly broken when you noticed that a certain raccoon was missing. This caused you to look around as he thought out loud, "Huh, I wonder where Roger is?...."

Although a sudden shake of the ground not only caused you to trail off but to somewhat lose your balance. Thankfully Peter quickly took a hold of you to make sure you didn't fall. You then saw him look off in the distance as he placed you on his right shoulder once he had stood up onto his feet and pointed out, "It seems to be coming form over there."

You then held onto the skunk's neck when he started to carefully walk towards where the shaking was coming from. Although in the back of your mind you feared that you knew what or rather who was causing the ground to shake. Thankfully though it didn't take Peter long to get to where the shaking was coming from as it was in a clearing in the woods. And upon sqinting your eyes a bit you saw that it was Roger like you had assumed it was. However, upon a closer lok the heavily muscled raccoon looked big, like really big. But once Peter had walked up to him you saw that Roger was....
1421312132212.title: A Big Raccoon

info.brief_description: Your annual trip goes more than a bit unexpectedly when something/someone starts changing.
info.description:
Your name is Josh, you're 24, single, with an average height of 5'10, an average build not fat not muscled just plain, and stuck in an average old job that was going to be the death of you. Thus you resolved to take a vacation every year in a remote cabin and just decompress with no one to answer to and only yourself to please. This year though, even though everything was as painfully the same as ever, when you thought of your upcoming trip something felt amiss.

This will be a M/M story so please if you're adding adhere to that.

This will pretty much feature whatever you want whether it be giants, tinies, anthros pretty much anything goes I'd just prefer not to see scat, rubber, diapers, or people turning inanimate.

Feel free to add and I'll try to add back, but if you'd like you can send your submissions to me and I can add for you, or just feel free to talk about a story direction with me.
